name: requestrr
description: A Bun.js library for sending raw HTTP/HTTPS requests with support for intentionally malformed payloads. For security testing and protocol research.
author: Filip Nyquist <fnyquist@pm.me>

scripts.build: bun run check && bun build ./src/index.ts --outdir ./dist --target bun && tsc -p tsconfig.build.json
